title: Vechain and AWorld Partner Up to Tackle Carbon Footprints and Reward Sustainable Actions
description: VeChain collaborates with AWorld to track sustainability actions and reward users with NFTs, enhancing eco-conscious behavior. This partnership will debut at the Nitto ATP Finals 2023, featuring a Carbon Footprint Station and opportunities to win exclusive Phygital Tennis rackets as NFTs. Innovating Sustainability Through Blockchain VeChain, a leader in blockchain technology, has partnered with AWorld, [...]

title: XRP Supporter Blasts Impersonator Behind Fake ETF Misinformation
description:
Dark Defender, an XRP influencer and crypto strategist, has criticized those behind a falsified listing of a BlackRock XRP ETF that surfaced online this week. In a recent post on X, the strategist expressed his displeasure toward the actors responsible, saying that he hoped they would get caught and punished. According to Dark Defender, XRP […]

The post XRP Supporter Blasts Impersonator Behind Fake ETF Misinformation appeared first on Coin Edition.
